title: New: Dream Koala – Odyssey
body:
Cut from his forthcoming EP, due out 23 September, Berlin’s **Dream Koala** toes the line between James Blake’s emotionally fraught masterpieces, and the blossoming, instrumental compositions more commonly associated with the likes of Mount Kimbie or XXYYXX.

_Odyssey_ is the confrontation of fear, and a questioning of the fine line that runs between life and death; all-in-all, a rather wondrous release. Check it out below, and grab a free download.
